content: My aunt who passed away yesterday and now joins my mom and Helen, their oldest sister.  Jenie made me laugh so... http://fb.me/7EamyeWh0
@TheMattEspinosa My uncle passed away yesterday. On New Years Eve
Prayers for my family would be appreciated. A good family friend of ours passed away yesterday from a heart attack during her dialysis.
Just found out that my grandmother's partner of over 30 years passed away yesterday from leukemia...great start to the year, huh? #OoC
Found out my Gma passed away yesterday.  Im sad..  even tho I hardly knew her, i always got love & positive vibes from her. #RIPGrandmaD

My thoughts and prayers go to the Newey Family.  Their canine Reggie passed away yesterday.  
Poppy, my heart is... http://fb.me/2RePrIQZ7
@KoreanWarVets my grandfather Lindon C Gregory 1st Marines passed away yesterday. I miss him. He fought in the Korean War and is my hero.

Not a good day, not a good morning to start with. 
My good friend in SHC passed away yesterday. 
Really surprised to hear that.
I still can't believe my cousin passed away yesterday morning
my uncle in law passed away yesterday on New Year's eve, not a great start to 2015 :-(
Woke up w the Clueless photoshoot scene song in my head.  Random. Sad to hear Richard Gilmore passed away, yesterday!  #emily #lorelai #gg
Just found out my grandma Hebert passed away yesterday
My grandfather's brother passed away yesterday and it made me think of my great-grandfather... This is him http://www.jacksdale.org.uk/war-memorial/first-world-war-served/lewis-john-thomas …
Sad news: The gal that I went to HS with and married somebody from my neighborhood who had cancer while pregnant passed away yesterday.

My soul sister passed away yesterday,but she forever lives in my heart. 
#RIPLana  -Nirvana
my grandma has passed away yesterday, i don't really feel like tweeting anything, you guys have to forgive me, i promise i'll be back soon.
Fatiha for Qari Raza ul Mustafa Azmi who passed away yesterday - the son of my master Sadrush Shariah Amjad Ali... http://fb.me/6ZEWOQczu
Well shit, this isn’t a good start - although not unexpected: fuck cancer. My former roommate passed away yesterday.
My husband Bennie Capps passed away yesterday, A celebration of his life will be held at 11 a,m, on Friday,,,
My Nani (maternal grandmother) passed away yesterday.. Inna lillahi Wa Inna Ilaihi Raji'un. She was around 100... http://fb.me/6XVKxqKW8

My dad passed away yesterday. He was a great man and everyone who knew him will miss him every day.

My uncle Kin passed away yesterday. What s bittersweet holiday, so happy for my blessings but so sad since Uncle Kin is gone.
